actions.description: Dropdown menu label for tab actions

active.description: Used in toggles for active state

active_generic_pin_tabs.description: User's generic Pinned $tabs which are currently active

active_org_pin_tabs.description: User's $org Pinned $tabs which are currently active

available.description: Section header for items that can be added

bold.description: Font style option for bold text

cancel.description: title or textContent for buttons that prevent the current action from executing

cancel_close.description: title or textContent for the close button of modals

chosen.description: Section header for items that have been selected

cmd_export_all.message: Show the modal to export all saved $tabs
cmd_export_all.description: [command description] the user wants to export all $tabs. DO NOT USE PLACEHOLDERS

cmd_import.message: Show the modal to import new $tabs
cmd_import.description: [command description] the user wants to import new $tabs. DO NOT USE PLACEHOLDERS

cmd_open_other_org.message: Show the modal to open the current page in another $org
cmd_open_other_org.description: [command description] the user wants to open the current page in another $org. DO NOT USE PLACEHOLDERS

cmd_remove_tab.message: Remove the current page from the $tab list (if saved)
cmd_remove_tab.description: [command description] the user wants to remove the current page. DO NOT USE PLACEHOLDERS

cmd_save_as_tab.message: Save the current page in the $tab list (if not saved)
cmd_save_as_tab.description: [command description] the user wants to save the current page. DO NOT USE PLACEHOLDERS

cmd_toggle_org.message: Toggle the current page's $org value (if saved)
cmd_toggle_org.description: [command description] the user wants to toggle the $org for the current page. DO NOT USE PLACEHOLDERS

cmd_update_tab.message: Show modal to update the current page (if saved)
cmd_update_tab.description: [command description] the user wants to update the current page. DO NOT USE PLACEHOLDERS

confirm_another_org.description: [open-other-org-modal] request confirmation to the user to open the constructed link.

confirm_update_extension.message: A new version of $extension_label is now available!
confirm_update_extension.description: an unknown message has been received from a listener

continue.description: textContent for buttons that allow the current action to execute

cxm_manage_tabs.description: [context-menu] open the modal to manage saved $tabs directly on Salesforce Setup page

cxm_pin_tab.description: [context-menu] let the user keep this $tab at the beginning of their list

cxm_remove_pin_tabs.description: [context-menu] let the user remove their pinned $tabs

cxm_remove_unpin_tabs.description: [context-menu] let the user remove their not-pinned $tabs

cxm_sort.description: context menu to let users sort their $tabs automatically (parent menu)

cxm_sort_click_count.description: context menu to let users sort their $tabs by how many times they click their $tabs

cxm_sort_click_date.description: context menu to let users sort their $tabs by when the $tabs were clicked

cxm_sort_label.description: context menu to let users sort their $tabs by $label

cxm_sort_org.description: context menu to let users sort their $tabs by $org

cxm_sort_url.description: context menu to let users sort their $tabs by url

cxm_unpin_tab.description: [context-menu] let the user remove this $tab from their pinned list

delete_all.description: [popup] title on the bin to empty all $tabs

drop.description: [import] let the user drop their files onto the specified area

error_adding_tab.description: [error] Generic error used while adding a $tab

error_already_pinned.description: [error] the user tried to pin a pinned $tab

error_already_unpinned.description: [error] the user tried to unpin a unpinned $tab

error_cannot_move.description: [error] the requested $tab cannot be moved at the moment.

error_cannot_move_dir.message: This $tab cannot be moved in this direction!
error_cannot_move_dir.description: [error] the requested $tab cannot be moved at the moment.

error_check_update.description: [error] generic error while checking for extension updates

error_close_other_modal.description: [toast] The user tried to open more than 1 modal

error_cxm_check.description: [error] the context menu items could not be found

error_cxm_create.description: [error] the context menu items could not be initialized

error_cxm_remove.description: [error] the context menu items could not be eliminated

error_expand_url.description: [error] the $url to expand was not passed

error_expand_url_no_base.message: Cannot expand a $url without its host!
error_expand_url_no_base.description: [error] the base $url used to expand was not passed

error_extract_empty_url.message: Cannot extract $org name from empty URL!
error_extract_empty_url.description: [error] the $url from which to retrieve the $org name was not passed

error_failed_sync.description: [error] Generic error when the $tabs could not get synced from the user

error_failed_to_fetch.description: [error] The call to an external website did not succeed

error_get_with_no_org.message: Cannot get $tabs if $org is not specified.
error_get_with_no_org.description: [error] tried to search $tabs by $org without sending org information

error_import.description: [error] there was an error during the import process

error_invalid_key.message: The key parameter passed to the function is not valid
error_invalid_key.description: [error] the developer tried to call a function with an invalid parameter

error_invalid_request.description: [error] Generic error after getting a badly formatted message

error_link_with_id.message: This page could not exist in another $org because it contains an Id!
error_link_with_id.description: [open-other-org-modal] warning for the user that the link may not exist in another $org

error_minify_url.description: [error] the $url to reduce was not passed

error_missing_favourite_id.message: Cannot get favourite image without the Id

error_missing_key.description: [error] no translation found in the files

error_no_array.message: Invalid array or no array was passed
error_no_array.description: [error] did not receive a valid array

error_no_browser_tab.description: [error] background page could not establish an active browser $tab

error_no_callback.description: [error] function to call at the end of the method was not passed

error_no_data.description: [error] tried to get a $tab without sending data

error_no_headers.description: [error] The extension could not find where to put the favourite button

error_no_message.message: Did not specify a message to send.
error_no_message.description: [error] no message was found to be sent to other parts of the code

error_no_pinned.message: You do not have any pinned $tabs yet!
error_no_pinned.description: [error] the user tried to remove the pinned $tabs but they do not have any pinned $tabs

error_no_setup_tab.description: [error] The extension could not find where to put the favourite $tabs

error_no_tabs_selected.description: [toast] error when user tries to export with no $tabs selected

error_no_unpinned.message: You do not have any unpinned $tabs
error_no_unpinned.description: [error] the user tried to remove the unpinned $tabs but they do not have any unpinned $tabs

error_no_url.description: [error] the $url to check was not passed

error_not_initialized.description: [error] Generic error for when a variable is not ready

error_redirect.message: Cannot redirect. Please refresh the page.

error_remove_not_favourite.description: [error] the user tried to remove a $tab which was not saved yet

error_removing_all_tabs.description: [error] Generic error used while removing all $tabs

error_removing_other_tabs.description: [error] Generic error used while removing other $tabs

error_removing_pin_tabs.description: [error] Generic error used while removing non-pinned $tabs

error_removing_tab.description: [error] Generic error used while removing a $tab

error_removing_unpin_tabs.description: [error] Generic error used while removing non-pinned $tabs

error_removing_visible_tabs.description: [error] Generic error used while removing all visible $tabs

error_required_params.message: The required parameters for the function were not passed
error_required_params.description: [error] the developer tried to call a function without the necessary parameters

error_resetting_default_tabs.description: [error] Generic error used while resetting the $tabs to their default

error_tab_click_count.message: Click Count must be a non-negative number
error_tab_click_count.description: [error] user tried to create a $tab with a wrong click count

error_tab_click_date.message: Click Date must be a number which does not result in a date in the future
error_tab_click_date.description: [error] user tried to create a $tab with a wrong click date

error_tab_constructor.message: Use Tab.create() instead of new Tab()
error_tab_constructor.description: [error] tell the developer how to use the $tab class

error_tab_label.description: [error] user tried to create a $tab without a $label

error_tab_not_found.description: [error] the $tab was not included in the array

error_tab_not_pinned.description: [error] user tried to unpin a non-pinned $tab

error_tab_object_creation.message: When calling with an object, do not pass anything else.

error_tab_org.message: $org must be a string or undefined
error_tab_org.description: [error] user tried to create a $tab with invalid $org value

error_tab_unexpected_keys.description: [error] user tried to create a $tab with some not supported properties

error_tab_url.description: [error] user tried to create a $tab without a url

error_tab_url_saved.message: A $tab with this $url has already been saved!
error_tab_url_saved.description: [error] The user tried to save an already favourited $tab

error_tabcont_initialize.description: [error] the TabContainer could not be initialized due to an internal error

error_translationservice_constructor.description: [error] tell the developer how to use the TranslationService class

error_unknown_file_structure.message:
We could not understand a file you wanted to Import
If the issue persists, please share it with us by opening a GitHub issue
error_unknown_file_structure.description: [import] the user's file was not recognized

error_unknown_message.description: an unknown message has been received from a listener

error_unknown_request.description: [error] Generic error after getting a message which was not recognized

error_useless_remove.message:
Cannot remove:
Cannot remove a page that has not been saved before
error_useless_remove.description: [error] the user tried to remove a page that was not saved yet

error_useless_save.message:
Cannot save:
This page has already been saved!
error_useless_save.description: [error] the user tried to save a page that was already saved

extension_description.message: Create and manage custom $tabs in the available space on $salesforce_lightning Setup page.

general.description: Label for the general settings category

help_add_tabs_as_org.message: Marks new $tabs as $org_tabs so they're visible only when logged into that particular Salesforce $org

help_add_tabs_front.message: Newly favorited $tabs are inserted at the front of your $tab list in the Setup bar rather than appended at the end.

help_allow_domains.message: When enabled, you'll be able to see your $tabs as soon as you launch $salesforce_setup
help_allow_domains.description: [settings-help] for optional permission to enable us to be ready as soon as $salesforce_setup is opened

help_allow_export.message: When enabled, you'll be able to $export your $tabs and keep them on your computer.
help_allow_export.description: [settings-help] for optional permission to enable us to download the Tabs on the user's machine

help_automatic_open_login.message: Takes you to the $salesforce_login page automatically $if_click_popup outside of a $salesforce_domain

help_automatic_open_setup.message: Takes you to the $salesforce_setup page automatically $if_click_popup inside of a $salesforce_domain

help_drag_tabs.message: You may reorder your $tabs by using the dots and dragging it.
help_drag_tabs.description: [manage-tabs] explain how to drag the Tabs around

help_keep_sort.message: When enabled, your $tabs are kept in sorted order, depending on what you pick.

help_keep_tabs_left.message: Pins your saved $tabs before the standard navigation menu (Home / Object Manager) in Setup, instead of after it.

help_link_new_browser.message: When enabled, every saved $tab will open the related page in a new $tab

help_no_release_notes.message: Suppresses the automatic display of release note notifications after the extension updates.

help_no_update_notification.message: Disables periodic update reminder popups, keeping the extension UI clean (when you've disabled automatic updates of the extension from your browser's settings).

help_pick_language.message: Set the UI language for the extension only. If something hasn't been translated, the english version will be used instead.

help_prevent_analytics.message: Disables basic telemetry collection. The extension won‚Äôt appear in anonymous usage metrics.

help_prevent_lightning_navigation.message: Bypasses the Lightning Navigation API and opens links via full-page reload, which can be faster in some $org setups.

help_skip_link_detection.message: Disables the extension check verifying that a $url fragment matches the format of Salesforce record/object IDs ( used to automatically set the saved $tab as an $org $tab ).

help_tab_actions.message: Here you'll find a submenu to perform different actions on the $tab in the same row.
help_tab_actions.description: [manage-tabs] explain what the arrow on the right contains

help_tab_label.message: This is the common name you'll use to remember where this $tab will take you.
help_tab_label.description: [manage-tabs] explain what the Tab label is

help_tab_org.message: This is the Salesforce $org name where this $tab will be shown. If left empty, this $tab will be shown in every Salesforce $org you visit.
help_tab_org.description: [manage-tabs] explain what the Tab Org is

help_tab_url.message: This is the (shortened) link where you'll be redirected when clicking on this $tab
help_tab_url.description: [manage-tabs] explain what the Tab URL is

help_tip_click_link.message: Click to be redirected to the documentation for this setting!
help_tip_click_link.description: [settings-help] call to action to let the user read more about a specific setting

hide_other_org_tabs.description: [manage-tabs] button label to hide other Org Tabs

if_click_popup.message: if you click the extension popup

import_duplicate_description_0.description: [import] description of what the import process does part 0

import_duplicate_description_1.message: Two $tabs are considered duplicates if they have the same $url and the same $org
import_duplicate_description_1.description: [import] description of what the import process does part 1

import_invalid_file.message:
Invalid file type.
Only JSON files are supported.
import_invalid_file.description: [error] the file used for import is not a JSON

import_metadata.description: [label] import everything found in the file during the import process

import_successful.description: [import] import was completed. After this, a number of how many records have been imported will be shown

inactive.description: Used in toggles for inactive state

insert_another.description: [error-open-other-org-modal] message for when the user inserts the same $org in the modal

insert_another_org.message:
The inserted $org is the current one!
Please insert another $org
insert_another_org.description: [error-open-other-org-modal] message for when the user inserts the same $org in the modal

insert_valid_org.description: [error-open-other-org-modal] message for when the user inserts a wrong $url in the modal

italic.description: Font style option for italic text

login_to_salesforce.description: [notSalesforceSetup] call to action on a button to redirect the user to a $salesforce_login page

manage_tabs.description: [modal-title] modal to manage saved $tabs with editable fields and drag-to-reorder

manage_tabs_explainer.message: Edit, reorder, and manage your saved $tabs directly from this modal. Drag rows to reorder, or use the dropdown menu for more actions.
manage_tabs_explainer.description: [modal-explainer] explains the manage tabs modal functionality

no_manifest_github.message: Invalid or missing GitHub homepage_url in manifest
no_manifest_github.description: The homepage_url key of the manifest does not use a GitHub link

no_match.description: [error] in salesforce when the switch cannot match the requested action

no_tabs_to_export.description: [toast] error when there are no $tabs to export

nss_not_setup_page.message: This is not a $salesforce_lightning Setup page.
nss_not_setup_page.description: [notSalesforceSetup] the user is not on a Salesforce page.

open_here.description: [open-other-org-modal] radio button to let the user open in the same browser $tab

open_new_tab.description: [open-other-org-modal] radio button to let the user open in a new browser $tab.

open_settings.description: [popup] button to redirect to the settings page

open_setup.description: [notSalesforceSetup] call to action on a button to redirect the user to a $salesforce_setup page

opt_add_tabs_as_org.description: [settings] let the user add all new $tabs as $org-specific

opt_add_tabs_front.description: [settings] let the user add all new $tabs in front

opt_allow_domains.message: Allow $extension_label to access Salesforce pages, when you visit them.
opt_allow_domains.description: [setting] optional permission to run the extensions when the user is visiting $salesforce_setup

opt_allow_export.message: Allow $extension_label to export your $tabs when you request it.
opt_allow_export.description: [setting] optional permission to enable us ot export the user's Tabs

opt_automatic_open_login.description: [setting] when the user opens the popup while on a random website

opt_automatic_open_setup.description: [setting] when the user opens the popup while on a Salesforce website

opt_en_default.description: Default language option of the extension

opt_keep_sort.description: [setting] allow the user to keep their $tabs sorted by one of their keys

opt_keep_tabs_left.message: Keep favourite $tabs on the left of Home and Object Manager.
opt_keep_tabs_left.description: Toggle to pin favorite $tabs to the left side of the navigation bar

opt_link_new_browser.message: Always open links in a new browser $tab
opt_link_new_browser.description: [setting] when the user clicks on a favourite $tab, open it in a new browser $tab

opt_no_release_notes.message: Do not show update release notes.
opt_no_release_notes.description: [setting] let the user prevent the extension from showing release notes after it is updated

opt_no_update_notification.message: Do not warn about available updates.
opt_no_update_notification.description: [setting] let the user prevent the extension from search for new releases

opt_pick_language.description: [setting] $label to propt the user to pick their preferred language

opt_pick_sort.message: Pick by which field should the $tabs be sorted
opt_pick_sort.description: [setting] now the user can pick by which key to keep the $tabs sorted by

opt_prevent_analytics.message: Prevent use of Simple Analytics (do not show up in user counts).
opt_prevent_analytics.description: [setting] let the user prevent them from sending anonymous analytics

opt_prevent_lightning_navigation.message: Prevent use of Lightning Navigation (faster loading when unchecked).
opt_prevent_lightning_navigation.description: [setting] do not allow Lightning Navigation with explanation of feature

opt_same_tab_popup.message: page in the same $tab when clicking on the popup.

opt_sf_lang_cookies.description: Option to use Salesforce‚Äôs language setting. Tho use this option, users must allow the extension to read Salesforce cookies.

opt_skip_link_detection.message: Skip automatic check of Salesforce Id.
opt_skip_link_detection.description: [setting] when the favourites a $tab, prevent checking if there's an Id in the link that's being saved.

or_drop.description: [import] let the user move files with their mouse and release them

overwrite_tabs.description: [label] delete all saved $tabs during import process

page_will_open_current_browser_tab.message: page will be opened in the current browser $tab

permission_request_failure.description: [error] the user asked us to request them a permission but then did not accept it

permission_request_success.description: [success] the user asked us to request them a permission and they accepted it

pinned.description: User's $tabs which are always found at the beginning of the list

remove_tab.description: [alt] alternative text when pictures do not work

tab_label.description: the $label property of the $tab, its name

tab_org.description: the $org property of the $tab, if it's for a single Salesforce Organization

tab_url.description: the $url property of the $tab, where it points to

table_delete.description: [popup] assistive text for column with delete button

table_org.description: [popup] assistive text for column with $org checkbox

table_row_org.message: Click if you want this $tab to be available for this $org only.

table_row_org_name.message: The $org for which this $tab is available.

table_row_url.message: Enter the sub_URL where you want to be redirected.

theme_dark.description: [popup] title on the moon to switch theme

theme_light.description: [popup] title on the sun to switch theme

underline.description: Decoration style option to underline $tab text

underline_wavy.description: Decoration style option to apply a wavy underline to $tab text

unsaved_changes_confirm.message: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to leave without saving?
unsaved_changes_confirm.description: [manage-tabs] the user asked to go to a Tab without saving first

unselect_all.description: [modal] button to unselect all $tabs in export modal

update_available.description: a new update for the extension is available

upload.description: [import] let the user browse through their files and pick the right one

users.description: The name of the page related to ManageUsers/home

warn_upgrade_backup.message: Please $export your new $tabs as the file you've used won't be supported in future releases.
warn_upgrade_backup.description: [warning] the user imported their $tabs using a deprecated configuration of the json file

when_click_popup_while.message: page when clicking on the popup while

write_review.description: [popup] title for svg to request writing a review
